title: Terry Burrows - How To Read Music (pdf + mp3)

(Tutorial / general theory) Terry Burrows - How To Read Music (pdf + mp3 / ENG)


How To Read Music


Instrumental affiliation: all the tools Genre / Destination: Any Author: Terry Burrows Title: How To Read Music Publisher: st Martin Press Language: English Format: PDF + mp3 Audio Bitrate: 112 kbps Year: 1999 Number of pages: 127 ISBN: 0-312-24159-3 Pages Quality: average 




Description: A book for the independent development of musical literacy. Are the historical information on the development of musical notation, the concept of the height of sounds, rhythm and meter, the length, the modal facilities. There is information on the primitive harmony, the basics of phrasing. We consider non-diatonic scales and many more interesting things. All this is accompanied by a 70-minute drive Rip illustrate the theoretical material of the book.
